did.abstract: The collection contains manuscripts and correspondence associated with two of Mr. Catanese's books, The Brave Apprentice and The Thief and the Beanstalk.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Paul W. Catanese is a University of Connecticut Alumnus and children's book author. Born in New York but raised primarily in Connecticut where he graduated from Trumbull High School, Catanese is known for his "Further Tales" children's adventure books which are sequels to Grimm's fairy tales. Catanese has written seven books including The Brave Apprentice, The Eye of the Warlock, The Mirror's Tale, and The Riddle of the Gnome. In addition to authoring several children's fantasy-adventure books Catanese also works as an advertising writer for Cronin and Company, an advertising agency in Glastonbury, Connecticut. Currently, Catanese lives in Connecticut with his wife and three children.
